aboutIntro: ExcellHub is an online learning platform connecting learners with qualified instructors in areas like management, IT, administration, and more.
missionText: To offer every African learner flexible access to quality, remote, and certifying education.
visionText: To build an inclusive and innovative learning ecosystem that strengthens professional skills across the continent.
